text: Cordovero () is one of fifteen parishes in Pravia, a municipality within the province and autonomous community of Asturias, in northern Spain. The population is 102 (INE 2007). ==Villages and hamlets== * Cordovero (Cordoveiru) * La Castañal * Las Piñera * Villamondrid (Villamundriz) ==References== Category:Parishes in Pravia
title: Cordovero
